jobs.job_description: Company Description Rixos Premium Qetaifan Island North Rixos Premium Qetaifan Island North comprises a 345-key hotel, along with a souq encompassing 11,000sqm of leasing space, a beach club, a theme park, and a waterpark. The resort boasts panoramic views of the Arabian Gulf. Rixos plans to provide a platform for showcasing Qatar as a tourism destination. One of the country’s biggest draws will be Qetaifan Island North’s Meryal Waterpark attraction. The Rig 1938 is the world’s highest tower of its kind, reaching 82 metres. Job Description Bell/Luggage Attendant (Seasonal) This position is responsible to welcome and greet our guests in line with our company standards. Assist the guests with their luggage, respond to inquiries, and upsell our products and services. • Greet and welcome guests at the main entrance. • Assist in driveway management. • Assist arrivals and departing guests by opening and closing car and taxi doors. • Maintain a clean and tidy entrance and baggage room. • Ensure timely pick up and deliveries pertaining to baggage handling. • Provide information and/or assistance to guests as and when required. • Remember individual guest’s names especially repeat and long staying guests. • Greet guests as they pass through the lobby to extend a personalized service. • Ensure all job assignments are properly logged in respective logbooks. Use the Duty Log to document matters of importance. Qualifications • Secondary / High school education • Previous experience in a similar capacity • Good reading and oral proficiency in English language • Ability to speak Russian language is preferred Additional Information

Company Description #BeLimitless We are far more than a worldwide leader. We welcome you as you are and you can find a job and brand that matches your personality. We support you to grow and learn every day, making sure that work brings purpose to your life, so that during your journey with us, you can continue to explore Accor’s limitless possibilities. By joining an Accor brand, every chapter of your story is yours to write and together we can imagine tomorrow's hospitality. Do what you love; care for the world; dare to challenge the status quo! #BELIMITLESS Job Description Key Responsibilities: • Maintain the highest standard of guest service at the front entrance at all times • Warmly welcome and assist all arriving guests and visitors • Escort guests to Reception and recognize regular or returning guests • Provide guests with assistance on transportation and directions • Maintain good relationships with taxi drivers and manage taxi arrangements for guests • Keep the front entrance clean and orderly, with special attention to glass areas, doors, and ashtrays • Monitor and control traffic at the front entrance to ensure smooth flow • Report any incidents or accidents at the front entrance promptly to the Guest Service Manager • Handle valet services efficiently, ensuring guests’ cars are parked safely and with care • Note any pre-existing damage (e.g., dents/scratches) before issuing valet tickets • Coordinate with valet staff for timely parking and retrieval of vehicles • Remain alert to security concerns and follow appropriate safety measures • Stay informed about hotel events and guide guests to their correct destinations • Maintain a friendly, courteous, and professional demeanor with all guests and colleagues • Foster cooperative working relationships with other hotel departments • Follow all Health and Safety regulations and safe working practices • Adhere to department schedules and report to duty on time Qualifications​​​​​​Qualifications: • Strong proficiency in both verbal and written English • Ability to manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced, dynamic environment while staying calm and composed • Flexible with work hours, including availability for overnight shifts • Previous customer service experience is an advantage

Company Description La Cigale Hotel Managed by Accor is a prestigious five-star luxury hotel situated in the dynamic center of Doha, Qatar. Recognized as a prominent landmark for both business and leisure travelers, the hotel offers 225 elegantly appointed rooms and suites, nine exceptional dining and entertainment outlets—including two nightlife venues and outdoor seating areas—two modern ballrooms, a 490 sqm gymnasium, a 20-meter indoor swimming pool, and a full-service deluxe spa. Designed as an urban sanctuary, La Cigale blends contemporary sophistication with world-class hospitality. Conveniently located in central Doha, the hotel is just a 2-minute walk from Al Sadd Metro Station and a 30-minute drive from Hamad International Airport, offering seamless access to the city’s commercial and cultural hubs. As part of Accor, a global leader in hospitality, La Cigale Hotel is committed to delivering outstanding guest experiences while fostering an inclusive and growth-driven environment for its team. What is in it for you: • Employee benefit card offering discounted rates in Accor worldwide for you and your family • Learning programs through our Academies designed to sharpen your skills • Ability to make a difference through our Corporate Social Responsibility activities • Career development opportunities with national and international promotion opportunities. Why work for Accor? • We are far more than a worldwide leader. We welcome you as you are and you can find a job and brand that matches your personality. We support you to grow and learn every day, making sure that work brings purpose to your life, so that during your journey with us, you can continue to explore Accor’s limitless possibilities. By joining Accor, every chapter of your story is yours to write and together we can imagine tomorrow's hospitality. Discover the life that awaits you at Accor, visit https://careers.accor.com/ Do what you love, care for the world, dare to challenge the status quo! #BELIMITLESS Job Description • Supervise and coordinate the activities of the laundry staff during shifts. • Ensure the efficient and timely processing of all laundry and linen to meet hotel standards. • Monitor and maintain laundry equipment and arrange for repairs or servicing as needed. • Ensure compliance with health, safety, and hygiene standards in the laundry department. • Train and develop laundry staff to maintain high performance and quality. • Manage inventory of laundry supplies and chemicals, and place orders as necessary. • Maintain accurate records of laundry operations, staff attendance, and equipment maintenance. • Collaborate with housekeeping and other departments to meet operational requirements. • Implement environmentally friendly laundry practices in line with Accor’s sustainability initiatives. Qualifications • Previous experience in laundry supervision or management, preferably in the hospitality industry. • Knowledge of laundry machinery, detergents, and cleaning agents. • Strong leadership and team management skills. • Attention to detail and commitment to quality. • Ability to work under pressure and manage time effectively. • Good communication skills. • Flexibility to work in shifts, including weekends and holidays. Additional Information Our commitment to Diversity & Inclusion: We are an inclusive company and our ambition is to attract, recruit and promote diverse talent.
